description:
Updated formula provides longer lasting protection and superior waterproofing to the previous version, which was already great. Protect your footwear from wetness and grime with this easy-to-apply spray.

  • Safe for fabric, leather, and suede and all types of outdoor footwear
  • Repels water and stains and maintains breathability of fabrics
  • PFAS-free formula
  • 100% recycled container is made from post-consumer plastic and ocean plastic
  • Bluesign® approved product
name: Grangers Footwear Repel Plus Spray 275ml
